title: West Ham United vs Sheffield United (RAW EPL e8)
text:
The Raw Take is BACK in England - with this tour opening at West Ham United's home game against Sheffield United.

The hosts lost two on the trot and were anxious to get all three points at home.

The guests were buzzing after a somewhat sensational win against Arsenal and were looking to build on that.

The match ended all square at 1-1, but prior to the game we spoke to the Irons' fans - about their season and the move to the ex-Olympic Stadium.

Follow Alexey Yaroshevsky on Twitter and Instagram

The Raw Take podcast on iTunes, Facebook, YouTube and Google
description: The Raw Take is BACK in England - with this tour opening at West Ham United's home game against Sheffield United
